com.diffplug.gradle.oomph

Class Perspectives

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.gradle.oomph.Perspectives

  • public class Perspectives
extends Object

    Listing of common eclipse perspectives (window layouts).

    Useful for setting initial perspective OomphIdeExtension.perspective(String).
